name: Castle Grab
description:
Castle Grab Use your grapple hook to climb the castle and claim the throne! Aim, hook and swing! Make your way through two levels to reach the throne. Controls:
  • Move: "A" and "D" or Left stick
  • Aim: Mouse or Right stick
  • Hook: Mouse left click or Right shoulder button
  • Boost to hooked position: Mouse right click or Left shoulder button
  • Shorten rope: "W" or UP left stick
  • Lengthen rope: "S" or DOWN left stick

    *Use the mouse in the menus
